00010 EagleDbTuple* EagleDbTuple_New(EagleDbTable *table)
00011 {
00012     EagleDbTuple *tuple;
00013     
00014     if(NULL == table) {
00015         return NULL;
00016     }
00017     
00018     tuple = (EagleDbTuple*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTuple_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbTuple));
00019     if(NULL == tuple) {
00020         return NULL;
00021     }
00022     
00023     tuple->table = table;
00024     tuple->data = (void**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbTuple_New.2", sizeof(void*), table->usedColumns);
00025     if(NULL == tuple->data) {
00026         EagleDbTuple_Delete(tuple);
00027         return NULL;
00028     }
00029     
00030     return tuple;
00031 }

00033 void EagleDbTuple_Delete(EagleDbTuple *tuple)
00034 {
00035     int i;
00036     
00037     if(NULL != tuple->data) {
00038         for(i = 0; i < tuple->table->usedColumns; ++i) {
00039             EagleMemory_Free(tuple->data[i]);
00040         }
00041         EagleMemory_Free(tuple->data);
00042     }
00043     
00044     EagleMemory_Free(tuple);
00045 }

00047 void EagleDbTuple_setInt(EagleDbTuple *tuple, int position, int value)
00048 {
00049     if(tuple->table->columns[position]->type != EagleDataTypeInteger) {
00050         EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Wrong type.");
00051         return;
00052     }
00053     tuple->data[position] = EagleData_Int(value);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void EagleDbTuple_setText(EagleDbTuple *tuple, int position, char *value)
00057 {
00058     if(tuple->table->columns[position]->type != EagleDataTypeText) {
00059         EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Wrong type.");
00060         return;
00061     }
00062     
00063     ((char**) tuple->data)[position] = strdup(value);
00064 }

00066 char* EagleDbTuple_toString(EagleDbTuple *tuple)
00067 {
00068     char *desc = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTuple_toString.1", 1024);
00069     int i;
00070     
00071     if(NULL == desc) {
00072         return NULL;
00073     }
00074     
00075     desc[0] = 0;
00076     strcat_safe(desc, "(");
00077     for(i = 0; i < tuple->table->usedColumns; ++i) {
00078         if(i > 0) {
00079             strcat_safe(desc, ",");
00080         }
00081         strcat_safe(desc, tuple->table->columns[i]->name);
00082         strcat_safe(desc, "=");
00083         
00084         switch(tuple->table->columns[i]->type) {
00085                 
00086             case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00087                 sprintf(desc, "%s?", desc);
00088                 break;
00089                 
00090             case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00091                 sprintf(desc, "%s%d", desc, *(((int**) tuple->data)[i]));
00092                 break;
00093                 
00094             case EagleDataTypeText:
00095                 sprintf(desc, "%s\"%s\"", desc, ((char**) tuple->data)[i]);
00096                 break;
00097                 
00098         }
00099     }
00100     strcat_safe(desc, ")");
00101     
00102     return desc;
00103 }
